import React from 'react'; import styles from './Product.module.css' import {BsCurrencyDollar} from "react-icons/all"; import store from "../../store/store"; import {updateProductCurrent} from "../../actions/updateProductCurrent"; import {deleteProduct} from "../../actions/deleteProduct"; const Product =(props)=> { return
store.dispatch(updateProductCurrent(props.product))} >

{props.product.name}

{props.product.description}

Price:

{props.product.price}
} export default Product;
